name: Cook the Book: Mississippi Watermelon-Basil Martini
description: Here's a recipe that's sure to make your dad forget all about that six-pack in the back of the fridge. The Mississippi Watermelon-Basil Martini is made with gin and a hint of lime.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce simple syrup (1 cup water, 1 cup sugar, heated until sugar dissolves, then cooled)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a metal cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a martini glass, and garnish with additional lime if desired.
